articles.title: Singapore's Jigger & Pony named Best Bar in Asia, ranks 12th on the World's 50 Best Bars 2022 list - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: Only two Singapore bars made it to this year’s World’s 50 Best Bars list – Jigger & Pony at Amara Singapore and Manhattan at Regent Singapore.
articles.content:
This is the first time since 2017 that Singapore does not have a bar in the top 10 of the annual list. But it still had a healthy presence in last week's 51-100 Worlds Best Bars 2022 with eight.
